segment.source: How to Manage Application Groups in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Groups in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Application Groups in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Groups in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Application Groups in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Groups in the Server Management Console

segment.source: You can display and manage one or more applications in application groups in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: You can display and manage one or more applications in application groups in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: This can be useful when you want to do the following:
segment.target: This can be useful when you want to do the following:

segment.source: Organize many applications into more manageable subgroups.
segment.target: Organize many applications into more manageable subgroups.

segment.source: Create groups of applications specific to a department or other company division.
segment.target: Create groups of applications specific to a department or other company division.

segment.source: Group similar types of applications, such as financial software.
segment.target: Group similar types of applications, such as financial software.

segment.source: Simplify access permissions or license management by group.
segment.target: Simplify access permissions or license management by group.

segment.source: Change the properties of applications and application groups within a group simultaneously.
segment.target: Change the properties of applications and application groups within a group simultaneously.

segment.source: You can create a group, place it where you would like in the console's Applications tree, and import applications to the group.
segment.target: You can create a group, place it where you would like in the console's Applications tree, and import applications to the group.

segment.source: Then you can configure and manage the group's properties to affect all of its applications.
segment.target: Then you can configure and manage the group's properties to affect all of its applications.

segment.source: You can also move applications among groups.
segment.target: You can also move applications among groups.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Moving applications into groups does not affect the locations of their files (SFT, OSD, or SPRJ) on the server's file system.
segment.target: Moving applications into groups does not affect the locations of their files (SFT, OSD, or SPRJ) on the server's file system.
